name: Essential Linux
author: Willem Jan Glerum
description:
Jealous of people who are wizards with a terminal? Want to get some insight into how to get started using Linux to deploy your latest awesome app? Or just wondering how to exit Vim without a reboot? This is your chance.


Willem Jan Glerum will get you up to speed so you won't have to blink next time somebody asks you to configure an Apache reverse proxy on a machine with SSL termination.
preparations: Bring a machine. Leave your mouse at home.
